title.narrative: Jiaozuo Green Transport and Safety Improvement Project

description.narrative: The proposed project development objectives are to improve transport safety and efficiency along the selected transport corridors and to promote non-motorized trips within the pilot green corridor in Jiaozuo City.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :LA-Schedule 2, Section IIB. 2 | Description :Prepare interim unaudited financial reports no later than February15 and August 15 each year, in form and substance satisfactory to the Bank. | Frequency :SemiAnnual

Finance Agreement :LA-Schedule II, Section IIA 1. | Description :Prepare semi-annual project progress report no later than February15 and August 15 each year, in form and substance satisfactory to the Bank. | Frequency :SemiAnnual

Finance Agreement :PA-Schedule, Section IA 2. | Description :Jiaozuo Municipality shall establish and thereafter maintainthroughout the period of project implementation a Road Safety SteeringCommittee, with composition, powers, functions, funds,staffing, facilities, and other resources acceptable to the Bank, which shallbe responsible for the implementation of selected roadsafety improvement activities under the Project. Frequency: December 31, 2014
Finance Agreement :PA-Schedule, Section IC | Description :The PIE shall implement the EMP, the RAP and the RPF in a manner andsubstance satisfactory to the Bank. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :PA-Schedule, Section ID 1. | Description :Prepare by no later than November 30 of each year, an annual work planfor the implementation of the Project during the following year in accordance with such annual work plan as shall have been agreedwith the Bank. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :PA-Schedule, Section IIA 2. | Description :Prepare by no later than December 30, 2016, a consolidated mid-termreview report for the Project, summarizing the results of the monitoring and evaluation activities carried out fromthe inception ofthe Project. | Due Date :30-Dec-2016

title.narrative: Component B: Green Corridor Development - Indicator Four: Length of corridor constructed
Indicator Four: Annual number of non-motorized trips within the green corridor
Component A: Safe System Integrated Corridor Management - Indicator Three: Number of people whose road safety awareness is raised
Component A: Safe System Integrated Corridor Management - Indicator Two: Length of project corridor improved
Component D: Institutional Strengthening - Indicator Nine: Number of officials and staffs trained
Indicator One: Number of annual transport related fatalities along the project corridors
Component C: Public Transport Improvement - Indicator Five: Overnight parking capacity increased
Indicator Two: Travel time by public transport during peak hours on the project corridors
Sub-Indicator 3.1: User satisfaction ratio of women
Indicator Three: User satisfaction ratio of public transport services
Component C: Public Transport Improvement - Indicator Six: Percentage of buses equipped with ITS on-board units
Component C: Public Transport Improvement - Indicator Seven: Annual bus ridership
Component A: Safe System Integrated Corridor Management - Indicator One: Safe System foundation established
Component D: Institutional Strengthening - Indicator Eight: RSSC in function
